Equipment

From Walkscape Walkthrough

Namespaces

  • Page
  • Discussion

More

  • More

Page actions

  • Read
  • View source
  • History
  • Purge
Other languages:
  • English

Equipment are all the items in the game that can be equipped to your character for bonuses and abilities. There are gear items which can be equipped to one of the twelve gear slots, or tools which can be equipped to the six tool slots.

Contents

  • 1 Other Tables
  • 2 Gear
    • 2.1 Looted Gear
    • 2.2 Crafted Gear
  • 3 Tools
    • 3.1 Looted Tools
    • 3.2 Crafted Tools

Other Tables

If you are looking for equipment by source you might like one of the following tables:

  • Activity Equipment - All the gear and tools that can drop from activities.
  • Shop Equipment - All the gear and tools that can be bought from shops.
  • Upgraded Equipment - All the gear and tools that can be crafted from other gear and tools.
  • Other tables in progress. Ping Bonez565 on the discord to request.

Gear

Gear are items equipped to the character's gear slots in the "Gear" tab of the inventory.
